== Smil ==
 If you want <nowiki>[[RealPlayerInstallationMethods|Realplayer]]</nowiki> to be the default application to open '''Smil''' file types:

* '''Ubuntu'''

  Use the File Manager to navigate to a folder containing a ''Smil'' file. Click the file with the right mouse button, select '''Properties''', and then the tab '''Open With'''. Click the radio button next to ''Real''''''Player10'', and close the dialog window.

* '''Kubuntu'''

  Open Konqueror, and select ''Configure Konqueror'' in the ''Settings'' menu.  Navigate to the ''File Associations'' section using the side bar, then type '''smil''' in the ''Find Filename Pattern'' box. Select the known type labeled '''smil''' and add '''Real Player 10''' to the top of the ''Application Preference Order'' dialog.
